name: Lost and Found (Dawn Nyan)
description:
The office is about to close soon, and you still have so many things to log in your Lost and Found files. Turns out, the students at this magical college leave so many objects behind!

Controls: it's a typing game! follow the on-screen prompts and text. also, ESC closes the game.

Note: this was mostly just to practice some development in Godot, so keep your expectations low.

Note note: you can edit the list of items that appear in the game! Check out the readme.txt in the .zip for instructions.
